mapper.select: SELECT oo.id, oo.customer_id, oo.order_sn, oo.order_status, oo.order_from, oo.ec_platform_code, oo.reference_sn, oo.store_id, oo.wh_id, oo.pull_operator_id, oo.pack_operator_id, oo.out_gw, oo.out_volume, oo.remark, oo.cr_time, ooa.is_insure, ooa.insure_amount FROM out_order oo left join out_order_attachment ooa on oo.id = ooa.order_id where oo.id = #{id}
SELECT oo.id, oo.order_sn, oo.reference_sn, ooa.to_desc_logistics FROM out_order oo left join out_order_attachment ooa on oo.id = ooa.order_id where oo.id = #{orderId}

SELECT oo.id, oo.order_sn FROM out_order oo where order_status = #{orderStatus}
#{id}

SELECT oo.id, oo.customer_id, oo.order_sn, oo.order_status, oo.pull_status, oo.order_from, oo.ec_platform_code, oo.reference_sn, oo.store_id, oo.wh_id, oo.pull_operator_id, oo.pack_operator_id, oo.out_gw, oo.out_volume, oo.remark, oo.is_wrong, oo.cr_time FROM out_order as oo where is_wrong = 1 and order_status = #{orderStatus} and pull_status = #{pullStatus} and pull_operator_id = #{memberId}

SELECT o.id, o.customer_id, o.order_sn, o.order_status, o.order_from, o.ec_platform_code, o.reference_sn, o.store_id, o.wh_id, o.remark, o.cr_time, ooa.dest_contact, ooa.dest_country_code FROM out_order as o left join out_order_attachment ooa on o.id = ooa.order_id where
order by o.id desc

SELECT distinct o.id FROM out_order as o left join out_order_commodity_item oc on o.id = oc.order_id where
and (locate(#{kd.commodityName}, oc.sku)>0 or locate(#{kd.commodityName}, oc.commodity_name)>0 or locate(#{kd.commodityName}, oc.commodity_name_en)>0 or locate(#{kd.commodityName}, oc.commodity_spec)>0)
order by o.id desc

select id from out_order where id = #{orderId}
and customer_id = #{customerId}
